snippet: State Republicans, who have enacted the most restrictive abortion laws in the country, are considering other ways of making abortions harder to get.
abstract: Republican lawmakers in Arkansas, who have enacted country's most restrictive abortion laws, are considering other ways of making abortions harder to get.
lead_paragraph: State Republicans, who have enacted the most restrictive abortion laws in the country, are considering other ways of making abortions harder to get.

headline.main: Arkansas: Republicans Seek More Limits on Abortions
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Republicans Seek More Limits On Abortions
